scripts.serve: npm -s run watch-css & budo index.js:bundle.js --live | garnish
scripts.publish: npm -s run dist && npm -s run go-pages && mv -f dist-bundle.js bundle.js && git add bundle.js && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Updated demo bundle.' bundle.js && git push && git co master && STASHED=$(git stash list) ; if (( ${#STASHED} > 0 )) ; then git stash pop ; fi
